question: By the year 2050, 25 percent of the population of the united states will be 60 years of age or older. the cdc estimates that 80 percent of those 60 years and older have one or more chronic disease associated with deficiencies of this?

nodes.text: The respiratory system is estimated to be associated with deficiencies in 80 percent of United States residents aged 60 or older by the year 2050.
The cardiovascular system is estimated to be associated with deficiencies in 80 percent of United States residents aged 60 or older by the year 2050.
Blood vessels are associated with deficiencies in 80 percent of United States residents aged 60 or older, a population expected to comprise 25 percent of the total by 2050.
The immune system is estimated to be deficient in 80 percent of the United States population aged 60 or older by 2050.
